Specific to General Patient History.text: The summary does not mention the specific dates for the prostatectomy and cystectomy surgeries, as documented in the EHR.

Specific to General Followup.text: The summary states 'follow-up plans regarding the pancreatic mass and jaundice will be communicated,' but does not include specific post-discharge follow-up instructions such as 'repeat ERCP in 1 month for assessment of biliary tree and stent removal' and 'consider RP Lymph Node Biopsy as outpatient' as mentioned in the EHR.
